text: Three Dog Night is an American rock band. They were popular from the late 1960s and early 1970s. They had 21 hit singles and 12 gold albums between 1969 and 1975. ==Songs== *An Old-Fashioned Love Song (written by Paul Williams) *Joy to the World (written by Hoyt Axton) *Mama Told Me (Not To Come) (by Randy Newman) *Eli's Comin' (by Laura Nyro) *One (Is The Loneliest Number) (by Harry Nilsson). Category:American rock bands Category:Soul bands Category:Musical groups from Los Angeles
title: Three Dog Night
